title: Tsukuyomi: Moon Phase
synopsis: Freelance photographer Kouhei Morioka is traveling to a castle in Germany to take photos of paranormal activity for his friend Hiromi Anzai, editor of an occult magazine. Upon entering the castle, he's confronted by a young girl in a white dress and cat ears who calls herself Hazuki. She takes a keen interest in Kouhei and offers him a kiss, but she instead reveals herself to be a vampire, sucks his blood, and turns him into her slave.
voices: ['Saitou, Chiwa', 'Kamiya, Hiroshi', 'Ishige, Sawa', 'Yamazaki, Vanilla', 'Kakazu, Yumi', 'Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Kadowaki, Mai', 'Saizen, Tadahisa', 'Mugihito']
